title: NavStick: Making Video Games Blind-Accessible via the Ability to Look Around
authors: Vishnu Nair, Jay L. Karp, Samuel Silverman, Mohar Kalra, Hollis Lehv, Faizan Jamil, and Brian A. Smith
description: We introduce NavStick, an audio-based tool for looking around within virtual environments, with the aim of making 3D adventure video games more blind-accessible. NavStick repurposes a game controllerâ€™s thumbstick to allow visually impaired people to survey what is around them via line-of-sight.
